name: Bus Driver Scheduling â€“ CR1
content: Modify the coverage constraint so that each task must now be covered exactly two times instead of exactly once. A shift may still be selected only once. The objective remains minimizing the number of selected shifts.
value_info: `n_tasks`: The total number of tasks to be covered.
`shifts`: A list of shifts, where each shift is represented as a list of task indices that it covers.

var1.descr: `x`: A list of 0/1 values of length `nShifts`, where `x[i] = 1` if shift i is selected.
